00001 ! =============================================
00002 !
00003 !                CONFIGURE
00004 !
00005 !  Sets up physical system: particle positions, velocities
00006 !
00007 ! ==============================================
00008 
00009 subroutine configure
00010 
00011     use physvars   ! Use internal particle arrays from lpepc
00012     use treevars
00013     implicit none
00014     include 'mpif.h'
00015 
00016     integer :: i, ipe, idummy=0, ierr, ifile
00017     real :: t_walk, t_walkc, t_force, t_domain,t_build,t_prefetch
00018     integer :: label_offset
00019     integer :: faces(maxlayers)
00020     real ::  V_layer(maxlayers), A_layer(maxlayers), Q_layer(maxlayers)
00021     real ::  qpart_layer(maxlayers), mass_layer(maxlayers), ai_layer(maxlayers)
00022     integer :: ipstart, ipstart_e, offset_e, ipstart_i, offset_i, nlayp, np_rest, ne_rest, ni_rest, nep0, nip0
00023     !APLR stuff:
00024     integer :: nlaypfront,nlaypback
00025     ! foam stuff
00026     integer :: nshell, ne_shell, ni_shell, ishell, jshell, kshell, nshell_x, nshell_y, nshell_z
00027     integer :: nep_shell, nip_shell, jion
00028     real :: Vshell, Ashell, Qshell, qe_shell, mass_e_shell, a_ee_shell, qi_shell, mass_i_shell, a_ii_shell
00029 
00030     npp = nep+nip  ! initial # particles on this CPU
00031     nep0 = nep
00032     nip0 = nip
00033     !  Make particle numbers on root known (in case of unequal particle #s - need for label offset)
00034     call MPI_BCAST( nep0, 1, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00035     call MPI_BCAST( nip0, 1, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00036     ne_rest = nep0-nep
00037     ni_rest = nip0-nip
00038 
00039 
00040     if (restart) then
00041 
00042         call predef_parts    ! Predefined particle properties read from peXX/parts_dump.NNNNNN
00043 
00044         !  Find critical/shelf densities if laser switched on
00045 
00046         if (beam_config ==4 ) call track_nc 
00047         if (beam_config ==5) focus(1)=focus(1)+x_offset
00048 
00049     else
00050         ! Setup new plasma or special configuration
00051 
00052         ! Thermal velocities - Maxwellian 
00053 
00054         vte = sqrt(Te_keV/511.)  ! convert from keV to /c
00055         vti = sqrt(Ti_keV/511./mass_ratio)
00056 
00057         new_config: select case(plasma_config)
00058 
00059 
00060 
00061 
00062         case(1)        ! Set up single neutral plasma target according to geometry
00063             !     =========================================================================
00064 
00065             if (debug_level==2 .and. me==0) then
00066                 write(*,*) "Setting up single plasma target"
00067             endif
00068             plasma_centre =  (/ xl/2., yl/2., zl/2. /) ! Centre of plasma
00069 
00070             velocity_config=1
00071             offset_e = me*nep + ne_rest
00072             offset_i = ne + me*nip + ni_rest
00073 
00074             ! Electrons 
00075             call plasma_start( 1, nep, ne, offset_e, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00076                 -rho0, -1.0, 1.0, vte, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre+displace, &
00077                 number_faces, Vplas, Aplas, Qplas, qe, mass_e, a_ee )
00078             !write (*,*) 'Electrons Vplas, Qplas:',Vplas, Qplas
00079             ! Ions
00080             call plasma_start( nep+1, nip, ni, offset_i, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00081                 rho0, 1.0, mass_ratio, vti, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre+displace, &
00082                 number_faces, Vplas, Aplas, Qplas, qi, mass_i, a_ii )
00083 
00084             !write (*,*) 'ions Vplas, Qplas:',Vplas, Qplas
00085 
00086             if (scheme /= 5 .and. ramp) then
00087                 call add_ramp(x_plasma)     ! add exponential ramp to target (stretch container)
00088             endif
00089 
00090         case(2)        ! Special test config
00091             call special_start(ispecial)
00092 
00093         case(3)        ! Spatially separated ion and electron slabs
00094 
00095             target_geometry=0
00096             velocity_config=2   ! Ions cold, electrons with vx=vosc
00097             plasma_centre =  (/ xl/4., yl/2., zl/2. /) ! Centre of plasma
00098             offset_i = me*nip + ni_rest
00099             offset_e = ni + me*nep + ne_rest
00100 
00101             ! Ions
00102             call plasma_start( 1, nip, ni, offset_i, target_geometry, 0, idim, &
00103                 rho0, 1.0, mass_ratio, vti, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre, &
00104                 number_faces, Vplas, Aplas, Qplas, qi, mass_i, a_ii )
00105 
00106             ! Electrons shifted by displace vector 
00107             call plasma_start( nip+1, nep, ne, offset_e, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00108                 -rho0, -1.0, 1.0, vosc, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre+displace, &
00109                 number_faces, Vplas, Aplas, Qplas, qe, mass_e, a_ee )
00110 
00111 
00112 
00113 
00114         case(4)        ! Spherical Coulomb explosion
00115             !    ============================================
00116 
00117 
00118             if (debug_level==2 .and. me==0) then
00119                 write(*,*) "Setting up ion sphere"
00120             endif
00121             target_geometry=1
00122             velocity_config=0   ! Ions cold, electrons with radial v0=vosc
00123             plasma_centre =  (/ xl/2., yl/2., zl/2. /) ! Centre of plasma
00124             !        plasma_centre =  (/ 0., 0., 0. /) ! Centre of plasma
00125             offset_e = me*nep + ne_rest
00126             offset_i = ne + me*nip + ni_rest
00127 
00128             ! Electrons can be shifted by displace vector 
00129             call plasma_start( 1, nep, ne, offset_e, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00130                 -rho0, -1.0, 1.0, vosc, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre+displace, &
00131                 number_faces, Vplas, Aplas, Qplas, qe, mass_e, a_ee )
00132 
00133             ! Ions
00134             call plasma_start( nep+1, nip, ni, offset_i, target_geometry, 0, idim, &
00135                 rho0, 1.0, mass_ratio, vti, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre, &
00136                 number_faces, Vplas, Aplas, Qplas, qi, mass_i, a_ii )
00137 
00138 
00139             if (scheme /= 5 .and. ramp) then
00140                 call stretch_sphere(r_sphere)     ! create spherically symmetric density profile 
00141             endif
00142 
00143 
00144 
00145 
00146         case(5)        ! Foam: array of spherical shells 
00147             !    ================================================
00148 
00149             velocity_config=1   ! Ions, electrons thermal
00150             nshell_z=foam_geom(3)
00151             nshell_y=foam_geom(2)
00152             nshell_x=foam_geom(1)
00153             nshell = nshell_x * nshell_y * nshell_z
00154             ne_shell = ne/nshell
00155             ni_shell = ni/nshell
00156             nep_shell = nep/nshell
00157             nip_shell = nip/nshell
00158             if (me==0) then
00159               write(*,*) "Particles/sphere/cpu: ",nep_shell
00160               write(*,*) "Particles/sphere: ",ne_shell
00161             endif
00162             ipstart_e = 1
00163             ipstart_i = nep+1
00164             offset_e = me*nep
00165             offset_i = ne + me*nip
00166 
00167 ! Physical transverse extent of target
00168             
00169             y_plasma = 2*r_sphere*nshell_y
00170             z_plasma = 2*r_sphere*nshell_z
00171             plasma_centre =  (/ xl/2., yl/2.-y_plasma/2., zl/2.-z_plasma/2. /) ! Centre of first sphere 
00172 
00173             do ishell = 0,nshell_x-1
00174                 do jshell = 0,nshell_y-1
00175                     do kshell = 0,nshell_z-1
00176                         ! offset for next sphere
00177                         displace = (/ 2*ishell*r_sphere, 2*jshell*r_sphere, 2*kshell*r_sphere /)
00178 
00179                         ! Electrons 
00180 
00181                         call plasma_start( ipstart_e, nep_shell, ne_shell, offset_e, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00182                             -rho0, -1.0, 1.0, vte, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre+displace, &
00183                             number_faces, Vshell, Ashell, Qshell, qe_shell, mass_e_shell, a_ee_shell )
00184 
00185                         ipstart_e = ipstart_e + nep_shell  ! index start
00186                         offset_e = offset_e + nep_shell  ! label offset
00187 
00188                         ! Ions
00189                         call plasma_start( ipstart_i, nip_shell, ni_shell, offset_i, target_geometry, 0, idim, &
00190                             rho0, 1.0, mass_ratio, vti, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre+displace, &
00191                             number_faces, Vshell, Ashell, Qshell, qi_shell, mass_i_shell, a_ii_shell )
00192 
00193                         ipstart_i = ipstart_i + nip_shell  ! index start
00194                         offset_i = offset_i + nip_shell  ! label offset
00195 
00196                     end do
00197                 end do
00198                 ! shift for FCC
00199                 if (mod(ishell,2)==0) then
00200                     plasma_centre = plasma_centre +  r_sphere/sqrt(2.)*(/ -1., 1., 1. /)
00201                 else
00202                     plasma_centre = plasma_centre +  r_sphere/sqrt(2.)*(/ -1., -1., -1. /)
00203                 endif
00204             end do
00205             Vplas = Vshell
00206             Aplas = Ashell
00207             Qplas = Qshell
00208             qe=qe_shell
00209             mass_e = mass_e_shell
00210             a_ee = a_ee_shell
00211             qi=qi_shell
00212             mass_i = mass_i_shell
00213             a_ii = a_ii_shell
00214 
00215 
00216 
00217 
00218         case(6)        ! Spherical cluster with Andreev profile
00219             !    ============================================
00220             !  r_sphere is radius of equivalent uniform sphere
00221             !  - used to define particle charges before stretching outer portion
00222 
00223             if (debug_level>=1 .and. me==0) then
00224                 write(*,*) "Setting up Andreev cluster"
00225             endif
00226 
00227             target_geometry=1
00228             velocity_config=1   ! Ions cold, electrons with vte
00229             plasma_centre =  (/ xl/2., yl/2., zl/2. /) ! Centre of plasma
00230             !        plasma_centre =  (/ 0., 0., 0. /) ! Centre of plasma
00231             offset_e = me*nep + ne_rest
00232             offset_i = ne + me*nip + ni_rest
00233 
00234 
00235 ! Ion mass set to unity to define CE timescale (omega_pi^-1)
00236             call plasma_start( nep+1, nip, ni, offset_i, target_geometry, 0, idim, &
00237                 rho0, 1.0, 1.0, vti, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre, &
00238                 number_faces, Vplas, Aplas, Qplas, qi, mass_i, a_ii )
00239 
00240             ! create spherically symmetric cluster with Andreev profile
00241             ! r_layer(1) is characteristic radius r0
00242 
00243             call cluster_sa(nep+1,nip,r_layer(1),r_sphere,qi,Qplas,plasma_centre,mass_ratio)
00244 
00245             ! Electrons: use same geometry but reduced charge density
00246             ! - should get qe=-qi; masses reduced by miome
00247 
00248             call plasma_start( 1, nep, ne, offset_e, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00249                 -rho0*ne/ni, -1.0, 1.0/mass_ratio, vte, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre, &
00250                 number_faces, Vplas, Aplas, Q_layer(1), qe, mass_e, a_ee )
00251 
00252             ! Stretch electron positions to match ions
00253             do i=1,nep
00254                 jion=min(nep+nip/nep*i,nep+nip)
00255                 x(i) = x(jion)+eps
00256                 y(i) = y(jion)+ eps
00257                 z(i) = z(jion) + eps
00258             end do
00259 
00260 
00261 
00262         case(10)  ! 2 overlapping ion species
00263             !    ===============================================
00264 
00265 !            target_geometry=0
00266             velocity_config=1
00267             plasma_centre =  (/ xl/2., yl/2., zl/2. /)

00278                 number_faces, Vplas, Aplas, Qplas, qi, mass_i, a_ii )
00279 
00280             ! Protons 
00281             ! Adjust local numbers if total non-multiple of # PEs
00282             if (my_rank==0) then
00283                 np_rest = mod(n_layer(1),n_cpu)
00284             else
00285                 np_rest = 0
00286             endif
00287 
00288             nlayp = n_layer(1)/n_cpu + np_rest  ! total # protons on this CPU
00289             nep0 = nlayp
00290             !  Make particle numbers on root known (in case of unequal particle #s - need for label offset)
00291             call MPI_BCAST( nep0, 1, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00292             ne_rest = nep0-nlayp
00293             ni_rest = nep0-nlayp
00294 
00295             ipstart = nep+nip+1
00296 
00297             ! Place on top of first slab 
00298             displace = (/0.,0.,0./)
00299             !       displace = (/ x_plasma/2.+x_layer(1)/2,0.,0. /)
00300             label_offset = ne+ni+me*nlayp+ni_rest 
00301 
00302             ! Equal number of neutralising electrons 
00303             call plasma_start( ipstart+nlayp, nlayp, n_layer(1), label_offset, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00304                 -rho_layer(1), -1.0, 1.0, vte, x_layer(1), y_layer(1), z_layer(1), r_layer(1), plasma_centre+displace, &
00305                 faces(1), V_layer(1), A_layer(1), Q_layer(1), qpart_layer(1), mass_layer(1), ai_layer(1) )
00306 
00307             label_offset = ne+ni+n_layer(1) +me*nlayp + ne_rest 
00308             call plasma_start( ipstart, nlayp, n_layer(1), label_offset, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00309                 rho_layer(1), 1.0, mratio_layer(1), vti, x_layer(1), y_layer(1), z_layer(1), r_layer(1), plasma_centre+displace, &
00310                 faces(1), V_layer(1), A_layer(1), Q_layer(1), qpart_layer(1), mass_layer(1), ai_layer(1) )
00311 
00312             if (debug_level==2 .and. me==0) then
00313                 write(*,*) "proton charge ",qpart_layer(1)
00314                 write(*,*) "proton mass ",mass_layer(1)
00315                 write(*,*) "spacing",ai_layer(1)
00316             endif
00317 
00318 
00319             npp=npp + 2*nlayp  ! Total # local particles
00320             ne = ne + n_layer(1)  ! Global # particles
00321             ni = ni + n_layer(1)  ! Global # particles
00322             npart = ni+ne
00323 
00324             if (scheme /= 5 .and. ramp) then
00325                 call add_ramp(x_plasma)     ! add exponential ramp to target (stretch container)
00326             endif
00327

00473 
00474             ! Electrons 
00475             call plasma_start( 1, nep, ne, offset_e, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00476                 -rho0, -1.0, 1.0, vte, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre, &
00477                 number_faces, Vplas, Aplas, Qplas, qe, mass_e, a_ee )
00478             ! Ions
00479             call plasma_start( nep+1, nip, ni, offset_i, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00480                 rho0, 1.0, mass_ratio, vti, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre, &
00481                 number_faces, Vplas, Aplas, Qplas, qi, mass_i, a_ii )
00482 
00483             ! Tube = cylinder with inset
00484 
00485             write(ipefile,'(/a/)') "Setting up tube"
00486 
00487             ! Adjust local numbers if total non-multiple of # PEs
00488             if (my_rank==0) then
00489                 np_rest = mod(n_layer(1),n_cpu)
00490             else
00491                 np_rest = 0
00492             endif
00493 
00494             nlayp = n_layer(1)/n_cpu + np_rest  ! total # ions on this CPU
00495             nep0 = nlayp
00496             !  Make particle numbers on root known (in case of unequal particle #s - need for label offset)
00497             call MPI_BCAST( nep0, 1, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00498             ne_rest = nep0-nlayp
00499             ni_rest = nep0-nlayp
00500 
00501             ipstart = nep+nip+1
00502             label_offset = ne+ni+me*nlayp +n_layer(1) + ni_rest
00503 
00504             ! Place on rear of front disc
00505             displace = (/ x_plasma/2.+x_layer(1)/2.,0.,0. /)
00506             layer_geometry = 12  ! tube
00507 
00508             call plasma_start( ipstart, nlayp, n_layer(1), label_offset, layer_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00509                 rho_layer(1), 1.0, mratio_layer(1), vti, x_layer(1), y_layer(1), z_layer(1), r_layer(1), plasma_centre+displace, &
00510                 faces(1), V_layer(1), A_layer(1), Q_layer(1), qpart_layer(1), mass_layer(1), ai_layer(1) )
00511 
00512             ! Equal number of neutralising electrons 
00513             label_offset = ne+ni+me*nlayp + ne_rest 
00514             call plasma_start( ipstart+nlayp, nlayp, n_layer(1), label_offset, layer_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00515                 -rho_layer(1), -1.0, 1.0, vte, x_layer(1), y_layer(1), z_layer(1), r_layer(1), plasma_centre+displace, &
00516                 faces(1), V_layer(1), A_layer(1), Q_layer(1), qpart_layer(1), mass_layer(1), ai_layer(1) )
00517 
00518             npp=npp + 2*nlayp  ! Total # local particles
00519             ne = ne + n_layer(1)  ! Global # particles
00520             ni = ni + n_layer(1)  ! Global # particles
00521             npart = ni+ne
00522 
00523             if (scheme /= 5 .and. ramp) then
00524                 call add_ramp(x_plasma)     ! add exponential ramp to target (stretch container)
00525             endif
00526 
00527 
00528         case(21)  ! disc + tube: tincan target, 50:50 ion, proton mix
00529             !    ====================================
00530 
00531             write(ipefile,'(/a/)') "Setting up flange"
00532 
00533             target_geometry=2
00534             velocity_config=1
00535             plasma_centre =  (/ xl/2., yl/2., zl/2. /) 
00536             offset_e = me*nep + ne_rest
00537             offset_i = ne + me*nip + ni_rest
00538 
00539             ! Electrons 
00540             call plasma_start( 1, nep, ne, offset_e, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00541                 -rho0, -1.0, 1.0, vte, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre, &
00542                 number_faces, Vplas, Aplas, Qplas, qe, mass_e, a_ee )
00543             ! Ions
00544             call plasma_start( nep+1, nip, ni, offset_i, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00545                 rho0, 1.0, mass_ratio, vti, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre, &
00546                 number_faces, Vplas, Aplas, Qplas, qi, mass_i, a_ii )
00547 
00548 !  Turn 1/2 of ions into protons - assumes 50:50 mix @ same density
00549             do i=nep+1,nep+nip,2
00550                 m(i) = m(i)/mass_ratio*1836
00551             end do
00552 
00553             if (scheme /= 5 .and. ramp) then
00554                 call add_ramp(x_plasma)     ! add exponential ramp to target (stretch container)
00555             endif
00556 
00557             ! Tube = cylinder with inset
00558 
00559             write(ipefile,'(/a/)') "Setting up tube"
00560 
00561             ! Adjust local numbers if total non-multiple of # PEs
00562             if (my_rank==0) then
00563                 np_rest = mod(n_layer(1),n_cpu)
00564             else
00565                 np_rest = 0
00566             endif
00567 
00568             nlayp = n_layer(1)/n_cpu + np_rest  ! total # ions on this CPU
00569             nep0 = nlayp
00570             !  Make particle numbers on root known (in case of unequal particle #s - need for label offset)
00571             call MPI_BCAST( nep0, 1, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00572             ne_rest = nep0-nlayp
00573             ni_rest = nep0-nlayp
00574 
00575             ipstart = nep+nip+1
00576             label_offset = ne+ni+me*nlayp +n_layer(1) + ni_rest
00577 
00578             ! Place on rear of front disc
00579             displace = (/ x_plasma/2.+x_layer(1)/2.,0.,0. /)
00580             layer_geometry = 12  ! tube
00581 
00582             call plasma_start( ipstart, nlayp, n_layer(1), label_offset, layer_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00583                 rho_layer(1), 1.0, mratio_layer(1), vti, x_layer(1), y_layer(1), z_layer(1), r_layer(1), plasma_centre+displace, &
00584                 faces(1), V_layer(1), A_layer(1), Q_layer(1), qpart_layer(1), mass_layer(1), ai_layer(1) )
00585 
00586 !  Turn 1/2 of ions into protons - assumes 50:50 mix @ same density
00587 !            do i=ipstart,ipstart+nlayp,2
00588 !                m(i) = m(i)/mratio_layer(1)*1836
00589 !            end do
00590 
00591             ! Equal number of neutralising electrons 
00592             label_offset = ne+ni+me*nlayp + ne_rest 
00593             call plasma_start( ipstart+nlayp, nlayp, n_layer(1), label_offset, layer_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00594                 -rho_layer(1), -1.0, 1.0, vte, x_layer(1), y_layer(1), z_layer(1), r_layer(1), plasma_centre+displace, &
00595                 faces(1), V_layer(1), A_layer(1), Q_layer(1), qpart_layer(1), mass_layer(1), ai_layer(1) )
00596 
00597             npp=npp + 2*nlayp  ! Total # local particles
00598             ne = ne + n_layer(1)  ! Global # particles
00599             ni = ni + n_layer(1)  ! Global # particles
00600             npart = ni+ne
00601

00606             !####################################################################################################
00607         case(12)  ! A.P.L.R's set-up (8th March 2006)
00608             !=====================================================
00609 
00610             target_geometry=0
00611             velocity_config=1
00612             plasma_centre =  (/ xl/2., yl/2., zl/2. /) 
00613             offset_e = me*nep + ne_rest
00614             offset_i = ne + me*nip + ni_rest
00615 
00616             ! Electrons 
00617             call plasma_start( 1, nep, ne, offset_e, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00618                 -rho0, -1.0, 1.0, vte, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre, &
00619                 number_faces, Vplas, Aplas, Qplas, qe, mass_e, a_ee )
00620             ! Ions
00621             call plasma_start( nep+1, nip, ni, offset_i, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00622                 rho0, 1.0, mass_ratio, vti, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre, &
00623                 number_faces, Vplas, Aplas, Qplas, qi, mass_i, a_ii )
00624 
00625             ! Protons 
00626             ! Adjust local numbers if total non-multiple of # PEs
00627             if (my_rank == 0) then
00628                 !np_rest = mod(n_layer(1),n_cpu)
00629                 np_rest = mod(n_layer(1),n_cpu) !2 layers = twice the no. of protons
00630 
00631             else
00632                 np_rest = 0
00633             endif
00634 
00635             !nlayp = n_layer(1)/n_cpu + np_rest  ! total # protons on this CPU
00636             nlayp = 2*(n_layer(1)/n_cpu + np_rest)  !2 layers = twice the number of protons
00637             !nlayp = total # of protons in both layers
00638             !assume that np_rest << n_layer(1)
00639             nlaypfront = n_layer(1)/n_cpu + np_rest
00640             nlaypback = n_layer(1)/n_cpu + np_rest
00641             nep0 = nlayp
00642             !  Make particle numbers on root known (in case of unequal particle #s - need for label offset)
00643             call MPI_BCAST( nep0, 1, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00644             ne_rest = nep0-nlayp
00645             ni_rest = nep0-nlayp
00646 
00647             ipstart = nep+nip+1
00648             ! Place on rear of main slab 
00649             !-------------------------------------------------
00650             displace = (/ x_plasma/2.+x_layer(1)/2,0.,0. /)
00651             label_offset = ne+ni+me*nlaypback+ni_rest 
00652 
00653             ! Equal number of neutralising electrons 
00654             call plasma_start( ipstart+nlaypback, nlaypback, n_layer(1), label_offset, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00655                 -rho_layer(1), -1.0, 1.0, vte, x_layer(1), y_layer(1), z_layer(1), r_layer(1), plasma_centre+displace, &
00656                 faces(1), V_layer(1), A_layer(1), Q_layer(1), qpart_layer(1), mass_layer(1), ai_layer(1) )
00657 
00658             !And now for the protons:
00659             label_offset = ne+ni+n_layer(1) + me*nlaypback + ne_rest 
00660             call plasma_start( ipstart, nlaypback, n_layer(1), label_offset, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00661                 rho_layer(1), 1.0, mratio_layer(1), vti, x_layer(1), y_layer(1), z_layer(1), r_layer(1), plasma_centre+displace, &
00662                 faces(1), V_layer(1), A_layer(1), Q_layer(1), qpart_layer(1), mass_layer(1), ai_layer(1) )
00663 
00664             !We also need a layer on the front of the main slab:
00665             !--------------------------------------------------------
00666             displace = (/ -x_plasma/2.-x_layer(1)/2,0.,0. /)
00667             label_offset = ne+ni+2*n_layer(1)+ni_rest+me*nlaypfront
00668             ! Equal number of neutralising electrons 
00669             call plasma_start( ipstart+2*nlaypback+nlaypfront, nlaypfront, n_layer(1), label_offset, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00670                 -rho_layer(1), -1.0, 1.0, vte, x_layer(1), y_layer(1), z_layer(1), r_layer(1), plasma_centre+displace, &
00671                 faces(1), V_layer(1), A_layer(1), Q_layer(1), qpart_layer(1), mass_layer(1), ai_layer(1) )
00672 
00673             !And now for the protons:
00674             label_offset = ne+ni+3*n_layer(1) +me*nlaypfront + ne_rest 
00675             call plasma_start( ipstart+2*nlaypback, nlaypfront, n_layer(1), label_offset, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00676                 rho_layer(1), 1.0, mratio_layer(1), vti, x_layer(1), y_layer(1), z_layer(1), r_layer(1), plasma_centre+displace, &
00677                 faces(1), V_layer(1), A_layer(1), Q_layer(1), qpart_layer(1), mass_layer(1), ai_layer(1) )
00678 
00679 
00680             if (debug_level==2 .and. me==0) then
00681                 write(*,*) "proton charge ",qpart_layer(1)
00682                 write(*,*) "proton mass ",mass_layer(1)
00683                 write(*,*) "spacing",ai_layer(1)
00684             endif
00685 
00686 
00687             npp=npp + 2*nlayp  ! Total # local particles
00688             ne = ne + 2*n_layer(1)  ! Global # particles
00689             ni = ni + 2*n_layer(1)  ! Global # particles
00690             npart = ni+ne
00691 
00692             if (scheme /= 5 .and. ramp) then
00693                 call add_ramp(x_plasma)     ! add exponential ramp to target (stretch container)
00694             endif

00893             !assume that np_rest << n_layer(1)
00894             nlaypfront = n_layer(1)/n_cpu + np_rest
00895             nlaypback = n_layer(1)/n_cpu + np_rest
00896             nep0 = nlayp
00897             !  Make particle numbers on root known (in case of unequal particle #s - need for label offset)
00898             call MPI_BCAST( nep0, 1, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
00899             ne_rest = nep0-nlayp
00900             ni_rest = nep0-nlayp
00901 
00902             ipstart = nep+nip+1
00903             ! Place on rear of main slab 
00904             !-------------------------------------------------
00905             displace = (/ x_plasma/2.+x_layer(1)/2,0.,0. /)
00906             label_offset = ne+ni+me*nlaypback+ni_rest 
00907 
00908             ! Equal number of neutralising electrons 
00909             call plasma_start( ipstart+nlaypback, nlaypback, n_layer(1), label_offset, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00910                 -rho_layer(1), -1.0, 1.0, vte, x_layer(1), y_layer(1), z_layer(1), r_layer(1), plasma_centre+displace, &
00911                 faces(1), V_layer(1), A_layer(1), Q_layer(1), qpart_layer(1), mass_layer(1), ai_layer(1) )
00912 
00913             !And now for the protons:
00914             label_offset = ne+ni+n_layer(1) + me*nlaypback + ne_rest 
00915             call plasma_start( ipstart, nlaypback, n_layer(1), label_offset, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00916                 rho_layer(1), 1.0, mratio_layer(1), vti, x_layer(1), y_layer(1), z_layer(1), r_layer(1), plasma_centre+displace, &
00917                 faces(1), V_layer(1), A_layer(1), Q_layer(1), qpart_layer(1), mass_layer(1), ai_layer(1) )
00918 
00919             !We also need a another layer in the same place
00920             !--------------------------------------------------------
00921             displace = (/ x_plasma/2.+x_layer(2)/2,0.,0. /)
00922             label_offset = ne+ni+2*n_layer(2)+ni_rest+me*nlaypfront
00923             ! Equal number of neutralising electrons 
00924             call plasma_start( ipstart+2*nlaypback+nlaypfront, nlaypfront, n_layer(2), label_offset, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00925                 -rho_layer(2), -1.0, 1.0, vte, x_layer(2), y_layer(2), z_layer(2), r_layer(2), plasma_centre+displace, &
00926                 faces(2), V_layer(2), A_layer(2), Q_layer(2), qpart_layer(2), mass_layer(2), ai_layer(2) )
00927 
00928             !And now for the protons:
00929             label_offset = ne+ni+3*n_layer(2) +me*nlaypfront + ne_rest 
00930             call plasma_start( ipstart+2*nlaypback, nlaypfront, n_layer(2), label_offset, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00931                 rho_layer(2), 1.0, mratio_layer(2), vti, x_layer(2), y_layer(2), z_layer(2), r_layer(2), plasma_centre+displace, &
00932                 faces(2), V_layer(2), A_layer(2), Q_layer(2), qpart_layer(2), mass_layer(2), ai_layer(2) )
00933 
00934 
00935             if (debug_level==2 .and. me==0) then
00936                 write(*,*) "proton charge ",qpart_layer(1)
00937                 write(*,*) "proton mass ",mass_layer(1)
00938                 write(*,*) "spacing",ai_layer(1)
00939             endif
00940 
00941 
00942             npp=npp + 2*nlayp  ! Total # local particles
00943             ne = ne + 2*n_layer(1)  ! Global # particles
00944             ni = ni + 2*n_layer(1)  ! Global # particles
00945             npart = ni+ne
00946 
00947             if (scheme /= 5 .and. ramp) then
00948                 call add_ramp(x_plasma)     ! add exponential ramp to target (stretch container)
00949             endif
00950 
00951 
00952             !###########################################################################################################
00953 
00954 
00955 
00956         case(15)  ! 2-layer slab with foam
00957             !    ==================================
00958 
00959             target_geometry=0
00960             velocity_config=1
00961             plasma_centre =  (/ xl/2., yl/2., zl/2. /) 
00962             offset_e = me*nep + ne_rest
00963             offset_i = ne + me*nip + ni_rest
00964 
00965             !  Main block
00966             write(ipefile,'(/a/)') "Setting up main slab"
00967 
00968             ! Electrons 
00969             call plasma_start( 1, nep, ne, offset_e, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00970                 -rho0, -1.0, 1.0, vte, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre, &
00971                 number_faces, Vplas, Aplas, Qplas, qe, mass_e, a_ee )
00972             ! Ions
00973             call plasma_start( nep+1, nip, ni, offset_i, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00974                 rho0, 1.0, mass_ratio, vti, x_plasma, y_plasma, z_plasma, r_sphere, plasma_centre, &
00975                 number_faces, Vplas, Aplas, Qplas, qi, mass_i, a_ii )
00976 
00977             ! Protons
00978             write(ipefile,'(/a/)') "Setting up proton layer"
00979 
00980             ! Adjust local numbers if total non-multiple of # PEs
00981             if (my_rank==0) then
00982                 np_rest = mod(n_layer(1),n_cpu)
00983             else
00984                 np_rest = 0
00985             endif
00986 
00987             nlayp = n_layer(1)/n_cpu + np_rest  ! total # protons on this CPU
00988 
00989             ipstart = nep+nip+1  ! local index
00990             label_offset = ne+ni+me*nlayp ! global label
00991 
00992             ! Place on front of main slab 
00993             !   displace = plasma_centre - (/ x_plasma/2.+x_layer(1)/2,0.,0. /)
00994 
00995             call plasma_start( ipstart, nlayp, n_layer(1), label_offset, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
00996                 rho_layer(1), 1.0, mratio_layer(1), vti, x_layer(1), y_layer(1), z_layer(1), r_layer(1), plasma_centre+displace, &
00997                 faces(1), V_layer(1), A_layer(1), Q_layer(1), qpart_layer(1), mass_layer(1), a_layer(1) )
00998 
00999             ! Equal number of neutralising electrons 
01000             label_offset = ne+ni+n_layer(1) +me*nlayp 
01001             call plasma_start( ipstart+nlayp, nlayp, n_layer(1), label_offset, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
01002                 -rho_layer(1), -1.0, 1.0, vte, x_layer(1), y_layer(1), z_layer(1), r_layer(1), plasma_centre+displace, &
01003                 faces(1), V_layer(1), A_layer(1), Q_layer(1), qpart_layer(1), mass_layer(1), ai_layer(1) )
01004 
01005             npp=npp + 2*nlayp  ! Total # local particles
01006             ne = ne + n_layer(1)  ! Global # particles
01007             ni = ni + n_layer(1)  ! Global # particles
01008             npart = ni+ne
01009 
01010             if (scheme /= 5 .and. ramp) then
01011                 call add_ramp(x_plasma+x_layer(1))     ! add exponential ramp to target (stretch container)
01012             endif
01013 
01014 
01015             !  Add foam layer (2) to rear side
01016 
01017             write(ipefile,'(/a/)') "Setting up foam layer"
01018 
01019             target_geometry=7
01020             velocity_config=1   ! Ions, electrons thermal
01021             plasma_centre =  (/ xl/2., yl/2., zl/2. /) ! Centre of plasma
01022             plasma_centre=plasma_centre+displace+r_layer(2) ! centre of 1st shell 
01023 
01024 
01025             nshell_z=1
01026             nshell_y=1
01027             nshell_x=2
01028             nshell = nshell_x * nshell_y * nshell_z
01029             ne_shell = n_layer(2)/nshell  ! # particles allocated to foam array must be exact multiple
01030             ni_shell = n_layer(2)/nshell  ! of # electrons or ions per cell
01031 
01032             ! Adjust local numbers if total non-multiple of # PEs
01033             if (my_rank==0) then
01034                 ne_rest = mod(ne_shell,n_cpu)
01035                 ni_rest = mod(ni_shell,n_cpu)
01036             else
01037                 ne_rest = 0
01038                 ni_rest = 0
01039             endif
01040             nep_shell = ne_shell/n_cpu + ne_rest  ! # electrons per shell allocated to this CPU
01041             nip_shell = ni_shell/n_cpu + ni_rest 
01042             nlayp = (nep_shell+nip_shell)*nshell  ! total # particles in foam on this CPU 
01043 
01044             nep0 = nep_shell
01045             nip0 = nip_shell
01046             !  Make particle numbers on root known (in case of unequal particle #s - need for label offset)
01047             call MPI_BCAST( nep0, 1, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
01048             call MPI_BCAST( nip0, 1, MPI_INTEGER, 0, MPI_COMM_WORLD,ierr)
01049             ne_rest = nep0-nep_shell
01050             ni_rest = nip0-nip_shell
01051 
01052             ipstart_e = npp + 1  ! local index, electrons
01053             ipstart_i = ipstart_e + nep_shell*nshell  ! local index, ions
01054             offset_e = npart + me*ne_shell + ne_rest  ! Global label 
01055             ! TODO: - may need to change this later to have sequentially numbered species
01056             offset_i = npart + n_layer(2) + me*ni_shell + ni_rest
01057 
01058             do ishell = 0,nshell_z-1
01059                 do jshell = 0,nshell_y-1
01060                     do kshell = 0,nshell_x-1
01061                         displace = (/ 2*ishell*r_sphere, 2*jshell*r_sphere, 2*kshell*r_sphere /)
01062 
01063                         ! Electrons 
01064 
01065                         call plasma_start( ipstart_e, nep_shell, ne_shell, offset_e, target_geometry, velocity_config, idim, &
01066                             -rho_layer(2), -1.0, 1.0, vte, x_layer(2), y_layer(2), z_layer(2), r_layer(2), plasma_centre+displace, &
01067                             faces(2), V_layer(2), A_layer(2), Q_layer(2), qpart_layer(2), mass_layer(2), a_layer(2) )
01068 
01069                         ipstart_e = ipstart_e + nep_shell  ! index start
01070                         offset_e = offset_e + nep_shell  ! label offset
01071 
01072                         ! Ions
01073                         call plasma_start( ipstart_i, nip_shell, ni_shell, offset_i, target_geometry, 0, idim, &
01074                             rho_layer(2), 1.0, mratio_layer(2), vti, x_layer(2), y_layer(2), z_layer(2), r_layer(2), plasma_centre+displace, &
01075                             faces(2), V_layer(2), A_layer(2), Q_layer(2), qpart_layer(2), mass_layer(2), a_layer(2) )
01076 
01077                         ipstart_i = ipstart_i + nip_shell  ! index start
01078                         offset_i = offset_i + nip_shell  ! label offset
01079 
01080                     end do
01081                 end do
01082                 ! shift for FCC
01083                 if (mod(ishell,2)==0) then
01084                     plasma_centre = plasma_centre +  r_layer(2)/sqrt(2.)*(/ -1., 1., 1. /)
01085                 else
01086                     plasma_centre = plasma_centre +  r_layer(2)/sqrt(2.)*(/ -1., -1., -1. /)
01087                 endif
01088             end do
01089 
01090 
01091             npp=npp + nlayp  ! Total # local particles
01092             ne = ne + n_layer(2)  ! Global # particles
01093             ni = ni + n_layer(2)  ! Global # particles
01094             npart = ni+ne
01095             if (debug_level==2) then
01096                 write(*,*)  "# particles increased to (cpu, global):",npp,npart
01097             endif
01098 
01099         case default     ! Default = 0 - no plasma target
01100             if (me==0) write (6,*) 'Warning: no plasma set up'
01101             npart=0
01102             npp = 0
01103             Vplas = x_plasma * y_plasma * z_plasma
01104             Aplas = x_plasma * y_plasma
01105             plasma_centre =  (/ xl/2., yl/2., zl/2. /) ! Centre of plasma
01106             Qplas = 1.
01107         end select new_config
01108 
01109 
01110 
01111         laser_config: select case(plasma_config)
01112         case(0)
01113             focus = (/ xl/4., yl/2., zl/2. /) ! Centre of laser focal spot
01114 
01115         case(1,3,4)
01116             ! Centre of laser focal spot
01117             laser_focus: select case(target_geometry)
01118 
01119             case(0) ! slab
01120                 focus = (/ xl/2. + x_offset, yl/2., zl/2. /) 
01121             case(1,11) ! sphere
01122                 focus = (/ xl/2.-r_sphere, yl/2., zl/2./) 
01123             case(2,12) ! disc, tube
01124                 focus = (/ xl/2.-x_plasma/2., yl/2., zl/2. /) 
01125             case(3,13) ! wire
01126                 focus = (/ xl/2.-r_sphere+x_offset, yl/2., zl/2.+z_offset /) 
01127             case(4) ! ellipsoid
01128                 focus = (/ xl/2.-x_plasma*r_sphere, yl/2., zl/2. /) 
01129             case(5) ! wedge
01130                 focus = (/ xl/2.-x_plasma/2., yl/2., zl/2. /)
01131             case(6,16,26,36) ! hemisphere/hollow hemisphere
01132                 focus = (/ xl/2.-r_sphere/2., yl/2., zl/2. /)
01133 
01134             end select laser_focus
01135         case(2)
01136         case(10)
01137             focus = plasma_centre -  (/ x_plasma/2.+x_layer(1),0.,0. /)
01138         case(11)
01139             focus = plasma_centre -  (/ x_plasma/2., 0., 0. /)
01140         case default
01141             focus = (/ xl/4., yl/2., zl/2. /) ! Centre of laser focal spot
01142         end select laser_config
01143     endif
01144 
01145 
01146     ! Parameters & conversion factors derived from target/particle config.
01147 
01148     window_min = plasma_centre(1) - x_plasma/2.
01149     propag_laser=focus(1)
01150     convert_fs = 10.*omega*lambda/(6*pi)     ! convert from wp^-1 to fs
01151     convert_mu = omega/2./pi*lambda          ! convert from c/wp to microns
01152     lolam = lolam*2.*pi/omega  ! normalise scale-length
01153     r_neighbour = fnn*a_ii  ! Nearest neighbour search radius
01154     navcycle = 2*pi/dt/omega  ! # timesteps in a laser cycle
01155     nu_ei = 1./40./pi*a_ii**3/max(vte,1.e-8)/eps**2  ! collision frequency (fit to Okuda & Birdsall)
01156     sigma_e = 1./nu_ei   ! Spitzer conductivity
01157     intensity = 0.2*vosc**2*omega**2  ! normalised laser intensity
01158 
01159     if (ne>0) then
01160         convert_keV = 511./abs(qe)     ! convert from code energy units to keV
01161         convert_erg = 8.16e-7/abs(qe)
01162     else
01163         convert_keV = 511./abs(qi)
01164         convert_erg = 8.16e-7/qi
01165     endif
01166 
01167 
01168     if (mc_init) call mc_config  ! Do MC min-PE initialisation depending on config
01169 
01170     if (te_perturb) then
01171         call perturb_temp    ! Impose perturbation on Te for transport test
01172 #ifdef VISIT
01173         if ( vis_on ) then
01174             call densities
01175             call sum_fields
01176             call vis_fields_nbody(itime+itime_start)
01177         endif
01178 #endif
01179 
01180     endif
01181 
01182     ! Ion config - make sure potential repulsive
01183     if (scheme==5) then
01184         eps = a_ii*2.
01185     endif
01186 
01187     ! local and global # particles for  main routine
01188     np_local = npp
01189     npart_total = npart
01190 
01191     if (launch) then ! Ignore if still in config loop
01192 
01193         beamconf: select case(beam_config)  ! Configure laser or particle beam
01194 
01195         case(1)
01196             call beam           ! Fixed beam
01197 #ifdef VISIT_NBODY
01198             if (steering) call vis_control   ! Display default parameters
01199 #endif
01200         case(2)
01201 #ifdef VISIT_NBODY
01202             if (steering) call vis_control   ! Constant particle source
01203 #endif
01204             if (me==0) write(*,'(//a)') '===> Particle beam switched on' 
01205 
01206         case(8)
01207             call beam_dust   ! Dust particle
01208 
01209         case(3:6) ! laser on
01210 
01211             if (me==0) write(*,'(//a)') '===> Laser switched on' 
01212 #ifdef VISIT_NBODY
01213             if (steering) call vis_control 
01214 #endif
01215 
01216         end select beamconf
01217 
01218         call param_dump
01219 
01220         ! Compute initial field values - need these to get vec. pots consistent with velocities
01221 
01222         if (me==0) write(*,*) 'Computing initial fields'
01223         call pepc_fields_p(np_local,  walk_scheme, mac, theta, ifreeze, eps, force_tolerance, balance,&
01224             force_const, bond_const, &
01225             dt, xl, yl, zl, 0, &
01226             coulomb, bfields, bonds, lenjones, &
01227             t_domain,t_build,t_prefetch,t_walk,t_walkc,t_force, iprot, work_tot)   
01228 
01229         !  Initialise vec. pots. to avoid jump in induced E-field
01230         Axo(1:npp) = Ax(1:npp)
01231         Ayo(1:npp) = Ay(1:npp)
01232         Azo(1:npp) = Az(1:npp)
01233     endif
01234 
01235 end subroutine configure
